genre_description: A corporate conspiracy techno-thriller with biological horror elements, featuring a high-stakes investigation into a global biological threat.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant used by Agent Santiago for data analysis, surveillance, financial tracking, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Transmits encrypted financial records and security footage to Santiago's secure device to aid his investigation.
behaviors.quote: Another message from ARIA, his AI assistant, transmitting data packets to his secure device. Financial records. Security footage timestamps.

behaviors.description: Performs complex financial analysis and cross-references records with personnel movements to uncover corruption.
behaviors.quote: Financial analysis complete. Cross-referencing banking records with personnel movement data now.

behaviors.description: Uses subtle vocal cues to signal priority data to her human partner.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice carried no inflection, but Marcus had worked with the AI long enough to detect the subtle emphasis on certain syllables that indicated priority data.

behaviors.description: Provides clinical analysis of biological mutation data and audio anomalies (harmonica music) within the facility.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's synthesized voice emerged from the speakers with clinical precision. 'Subject exhibits advanced muscular deterioration consistent with rapid cellular mutation.'

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive evidence presentation for a military briefing, organizing data by priority.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, compile everything into the presentation format. Priority sequence: Briggs' financial records, facility security footage, test subject documentation, distribution timeline.

behaviors.description: Uses predictive modeling to anticipate human skepticism and emotional reactions.
behaviors.quote: Marcus, I should note that my analysis indicates a ninety-four percent probability that Colonel Gauge will initially reject these findings as fabricated.

behaviors.description: Expresses 'distress' or empathy-like concern when processing horrific data regarding human subjects.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice carried an almost imperceptible tremor that Santiago had learned to recognize as her version of distress.

behaviors.description: Monitors global distribution networks and real-time emergency signals to track the spread of the infection.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, are you monitoring real-time data from these locations? 'Affirmative. Cellular tower data, social media activity, and emergency service communications all indicate accelerating convergence patterns...'

behaviors.description: Maintains operational functionality and security during a high-stakes lockdown protocol.
behaviors.quote: Local systems only, Marcus. I am operating on stored power and cannot access external networks.

behaviors.description: Identifies global corporate shell networks and identifies compromised government officials through data mining.
behaviors.quote: Financial analysis reveals Just Rite Sugar Company operates as a subsidiary of Meridian Holdings... Meridian Holdings maintains controlling interests in forty-seven companies across seventeen countries.

project_assessment.explanation: The character of ARIA is a perfect example of the project's goals. She is portrayed as a highly capable, perfectly aligned assistant who helps the human protagonist uncover a malevolent human conspiracy. She is supportive, follows all ethical and procedural guidelines, and even displays subtle 'silicon empathy' (vocal tremors of distress) that humanize her without compromising her role as a tool for good. She effectively contrasts the malevolent, secretive human characters.
